txt.en: Instance: The Retaking of Cair Andros
'Does it come from far away?'
'To battle, men!'
'Keep your wits about you!'
'This way, my friends! More foes await!'
'We must reclaim the island fortress!'
'Come! We must hold this part of the island!'
'This way!'
'Fight them to the last!'
'The fighting intensifies!'
'We will stand our ground!'
'Father, from where does the water of the Anduin come?'
'Mother, look!'
'You returned, [placeholder], just as you said you would!'
'This way!'
'More of those axe-men!'
'I am not afraid of them!'
'None of you will survive this battle!'
'Mother, we have really retaken our home.'
'If only father and my brothers were here to see this moment.'
'Charge!'
'I'm gonna make you suffer!'
'More men join the fray to the south!'
'Come on you maggots, let's finish them!'
'Push onward, Duinhir! I will maintain this position!'
'You have come far enough, filth.'
'There is nothing to discuss. Your deaths will be swift.'
'Let us put an end to these fools!'
'This ground is ours!'
'If you want this land, you'll need to take it from me!'
'You will never defeat the might of Mordor!'
'Tharduin... Gilthand... my boys...'
'The source of the Anduin is very far from here.'
'It flows beside many shores, past the varied cultures of the north.'
'You can count on us, [placeholder]!'
'What different languages does it hear as it flows beside those lands?'
'We have come right to the thick of battle, it seems!'
'Even now, that life and knowledge is carried in the current.'
'Indeed. This was once our home.'
'For Gondor!'
'The water sees much as it travels.'
'We must not spare another moment, lest our foes regroup!'
'I will flank them from the right!'
'It leads to a new journey upon ocean waves.'
'We stand together. They are no match for us!'
'We must hurry and help our friends to the north!'
'Even when we are gone, the Anduin will flow, just as it does now.'
'Who stands uninvited atop the prow? Who comes unasked to our home?'
'A blockade!'
'Remove yourself, or I will use force.'
'Move on! I will defend this position!'
'Yes, Tolwin, I am proud of your courage and your bravery.'
'They are here, in our hearts, my dear.'
'Our allegiance is sworn!'
'Your fate is sealed!'
'I am not worthy, my brothers!'
'This is as far as you go!'
'No more from you!'
'You may have my life, but you will never have the east!'
'I assume these two are friends of yours, [placeholder]?'
'I am glad to fight with you, and help you retake your home.'
'We have yet to secure the prow.'
'Enough! I'll spill their blood!'
'I thank you for your assistance.'
'I'll show you who owns this island!'
'We will see victory this day!'
'You may have killed Molvag√∫r, but you won't kill me!'
'Cair Andros is almost ours!'
'How can this be?!'
